title: AraNamum Agamum
sahitya:
AraNamum Agamum tEduporuL nIyE Ayar kulam vandaperum mAyavanum nIyE


anupallavi

  kAraNa virAtturuvan Anavanum nIyE kAmanaiyum bhUmanaiyum tandhavanum nIyE


caraNam    nAraNan enum parama nAyakanum nIyE nambi varum anbar tuyar tIrppavanum nIyE
pUraNamAi engum nirai brahmam adu nIyE ponnaDi paNindavenaik-kAppavanum nIyE
